hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: From simple websites to complex enterprise systems, we have the expertise and technology stack to bring your vision to life.

services.title: UX/UI Design
services.description: User research, wireframing, prototyping, visual design, usability testing, and developer handoff

services.title: E-Commerce Solutions
services.description: Online stores with product catalogs, carts, payment gateways, multi-vendor marketplaces, and custom dashboards

services.title: Mobile Applications
services.description: Full-featured iOS & Android apps for on-demand services, education, health, social platforms, and events

services.title: Business Management Tools
services.description: CRM, ERP, project management, team collaboration, and scheduling tools for appointments and bookings

services.title: AI-Powered Systems
services.description: Chatbot assistants, document summarization, smart search, recommendation systems, and OCR

services.title: Educational & Content Platforms
services.description: Online course platforms, document libraries, video streaming, webinar systems, and quiz platforms
